comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content: The shot is taken with the camera on the ground, an unusual angle that accentuates the Buddha's bowing posture. The bulletin board-like structures on the left and right have been moved. Nagasaki University has three other photos by Kusakabe which lack the structures. A couple of photos from pre-1919 on Flickr. NOW [http://www.flickr.com/photos/ashura666/2037432924/]

comment.author: 87914514@N00
comment._content: Hi, this photo has been discussed in one of the threads in the Flickr Commons group, and we'd love to have this added to the group pool!

All of the photographs presented in this thread are terrific!

This is an incredibly monumental sculpture which I would love to see in real life. :)
